snippet: Maj. Gen. Jeffrey S. Buchanan has denied clemency for Chelsea Manning and upheld the former soldier’s 35-year prison sentence.
abstract: Maj Gen Jeffrey S Buchanan denies clemency for Chelsea Manning and upholds the former soldier's 35-year prison sentence for providing secret files to WikiLeaks.
lead_paragraph: Maj. Gen. Jeffrey S. Buchanan has denied clemency for Chelsea Manning and upheld the former soldier’s 35-year prison sentence.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
